item.title: Polaris Files Technical Report for Black Bear Project
item.description: [at noodls] - November 17, 2016 VANCOUVER, British Columbia - Polaris Materials Corporation (TSX:PLS) (the 'Company', 'Polaris' or 'we') is pleased to announce the filing of a technical report for its Black Bear Project ...
